name: WP Manager
author: mlazarov

sections.description:
WP Manager extends basic functionality of Wordress XMLRPC protocol for better experience on wpmanager.biz

To use this plugin you have to create account at wpmanager.biz and add your blog.

With WP Manager you can manage your blogs from one place without need to walk to all your blogs to check for updates.

WP Manager features

  • Watch all your blogs for updates
  • Update Core
  • Update plugins

Soon you will also have

  • Update themes
  • many other cool features
sections.installation:
1. Put the plugin folder into [wordpress_dir]/wp-content/plugins/
  2. Go into the WordPress admin interface and activate the plugin
  3. Optional: go to the options page and configure the plugin

Before upgrade DEACTIVATE the plugin and then ACTIVATE and RECONFIGURE!
sections.faq:
How can I submit a bug?

Write me to martin@lazarov.bg, please, it’s the quicker way to have it fixed. You can write to the
WordPress forum, too, but I read it rarely.

Other FAQs?

I’m collection tips and FAQ on this page
so I can update it more easly.
